name: pnp-powerplatform-samples-embed-image-in-email-body
title: Embed Image In Email Body
shortDescription: This sample gets an image content from SharePoint document library and embed in it email body to share it with recipient(s).
longDescription: This sample gets an image content from SharePoint document library and embed in it email body to share it with recipient(s). The flow calls graph API by utilizing premium **Invoke an HTTP request** action to overcome size limitation(~1 MB) when embedding image using URI method.
